answers.author: Shane Hale
answers.text:
Kathryn:  I've brought in our local representative from ICMA-RC annually to meet individually with employees.  Normally, she'll do one or two presentations (that we select from her list), and will meet with anyone that is interested in 45 minute blocks.  My guess is that whoever your plan sponsor is, there is a similar service offered.
